casebody.data:
Gallo, Appellee, v. Trakas, Appellant, et al.

[Cite as Gallo v. Trakas (2000), 90 Ohio St.3d 164.]

(Nos. 00-403 and 00-482 Submitted August 22, 2000 Decided October 11, 2000.) Crabbe, Brown, Jones, Potts & Schmidt, Daniel J. Hurley and Steven E. Miller, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Johnson v. Rhodes (2000), 89 Ohio St.3d 540, 733 N.E.2d 1132.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
